dimensions: 3.25 h. x 27.25 diameter cm (1 1/4 x 10 3/4 in. )
title: "Canova"
description: Black design over a white background. The plate has a slightly scalloped edge. There are four scenes around the rim alternating with floral arrangements. In the center is an outdoor scene with a large urn overlooking a river.
name: Plate
